Convert subtitles file to minuted data.frame

Source: R/subtitle.R
read_vtt_as_df.Rd

Convert subtitles file to minuted data.frame

Usage

read_vtt_as_df(vtt_file)

Arguments

vtt_file

name of a subtitles file

Value

data.frame

Examples

path_vtt <- lexico_example("6IOUEJN6GRI.fr.vtt")
read_vtt_as_df(path_vtt)
#> # A tibble: 584 × 5
